Sutherland is lighting up today with 3 ft @ 14s WNW swell and fresh 25 mph SE winds. Good options include Melvich and Strathy, with the best windows from 08:47 to 15:25. Tomorrow, conditions drop to 4 ft @ 7s E with strong 38 mph ESE winds, making it poor across the board. The day after, Balnakeil and Sandwood Bay offer 3 ft @ 11s WNW with 16 mph ESE winds, providing some workable surf. Best: today.
